biography: Vikramaditya Motwane is an Indian film director, and screenwriter for films like Dev.D (2009) and Dhan Dhana Dhan Goal (2007). His directorial debut Udaan (2010) was selected to compete in the 'Un Certain Regardâ€™ category at the 2010 Cannes Film Festival and also won seven Filmfare awards.
name: Vikramaditya Motwane
